definitions.definition: A river in Marlborough , New Zealand , which is a tributary of the Wairau River.
A river in Southland , New Zealand , which flows into an estuary at Invercargill .

main_definition: A river in Marlborough , New Zealand , which is a tributary of the Wairau River.
secondary_definitions: A river in Southland , New Zealand , which flows into an estuary at Invercargill .
